summary:
During my PhD and post-doctoral positions, I've had the opportunity to develop a solid foundation (materials science, nanotechnology, electrochemistry, energy conversion devices and processes, lithography and etching) upon which to begin my academic research career, working in multi-disciplinary programs with strong ties to both private and public institutions. 

Experience and Skills:
• 10+ years of working experience in electrochemistry, hold expertise in designing and development of electrodes, electrochemical cells, various techniques and experiments

• In-depth knowledge in fundamental electrochemistry, single crystal electrochemistry, in-situ spectroscopy with electrochemistry.
• Extensive experience in synthesis of various nanomaterials of semiconductors and metallic compounds. 
• Extensive experience in elementary reaction such as hydrogen evolution reactions, OER, ORR, water splitting, PEM fuel cells & electrolysers, Solid oxide fuel cells and electrolysers etc. 

• Accomplished data analyst and offer proficiency in nanomaterial characterizations like XRD, SEM, TEM, EDX, XPS, 

• Sound knowledge in softwares like Origin, ImageJ, Origin, CasaXPS, and MS office. 

• Active communicator and team player with project management experience in interdisciplinary projects (India,France, Sweden, Netherlands and  and Germany.

• Ability to conduct, articulate and informative presentations as well as easily collaborate with cross functional teams
